rmtk:branch:cleanup.description: Delete profiles, empty pre-deploy folder, empty post-deploy-folder, reset package.xml and destructiveChanges.xml

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

rmtk:package:filter.description: filter sources from a package.xml file for convert or deploy

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

package.name: package
package.description: package.xml file path to filter source with

rmtk:package:prettify.description: reorder element and fix indentation in package.xml and destructiveChanges.xml files

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

packages.name: packages
packages.description: list of packages (package and destructive) file path separated by ':'

profiles.name: profiles
profiles.description: list of profiles file path separated by ':'

permission-sets.name: permission-sets
permission-sets.description: list of permission sets file path separated by ':'

rmtk:package:validate.description: validate package.xml element are in the sources

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

package.name: package
package.description: package.xml file path to validate package with

metadata-describe.name: metadata-describe
metadata-describe.description: metadata-describe.json file path to validate package with
